document_data.name: Kerima al-Zahir
document_data.mainbody: '''Kerima al-Zahir''' was a [[human]] [[Elemental mage|flame mage]] and member of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]] in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|31}}
document_data.Personality: Kerima's short temper matched her passion for her torrid magical specialization, leading her to challenge many lesser [[wizard]]s to personal combat, usually to the death.
document_data.History: Kerima only lost two personal challenges against other wizards. Both of those wizards were slain by [[holy slayer]]s shortly after their duels.
